amendment.description: To prohibit a full-scale underground nuclear test of the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator weapon without a specific authorization of Congress.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3403 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3403 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To prohibit a full-scale underground nuclear test of the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator weapon without a specific authorization of Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3403 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett.
